meta.title: Create API endpoint in django app from functional description, supported by DjangoRestFramework
meta.description: Implement endpoint in a django app to allow specific actions django objects (GET, UPDATE, POST, DELETE), without authorization management.

Input_data.QA: At at least: fields/data to return in case of success/error, action on django object, related django app name (if many)
Description of the action on the django object
Input_data.Example: When calling GET, the endpoint shall return all the fields of the object.

Input_data.QA: Description of what happens if action cannot be performed
Input_data.Example: When calling GET and object does not exists, or internal error occured, return http code 500 without message.

Input_data.QA: link to drive or github repository or .zip
name of an app that is in the Django project in the repository

Input_data.description: the ouput must work under this code version

Output_data.description: Working API for the object, more details here https://www.django-rest-framework.org/
